entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 late this evening then southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 12 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 12 with temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
